TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControl Inherits WebControl
public ref class BaseDataBoundControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

summary.span: 充当控件的基类，这些控件使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件绑定到数据。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that bind to data using an ASP.NET data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持控件体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够以一致的方式绑定到数据。ASP.NET supports a controls architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 绑定到数据的 Web 服务器控件被称为数据绑定控件，而用于简化绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 旨在使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件的数据绑定控件派生自 控件类，该类定义了基数据绑定控件功能。Data-bound controls that are designed to use ASP.NET data source controls derive from the control class, which defines the base data-bound control functionality. 您可以使用随 ASP.NET 提供的数据绑定控件（包括 、和 ）执行涉及显示数据的大多数 Web 开发任务。You can use the data-bound controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks that involve displaying data. 在这些控件未提供所需功能的情况下，你可以从基本 和 类继承以实现你自己的自定义数据源控件。In scenarios in which these controls do not provide the functionality you need, you can inherit from the base and classes to implement your own custom data source control. 尽管支持 `DataSource` 和 `DataSourceID` 属性以及 `DataBind` 方法的任何类都是数据绑定控件，但大多数 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件都扩展了抽象 和 类。While any class that supports the `DataSource` and `DataSourceID` properties and the `DataBind` method is a data-bound control, most ASP.NET data-bound controls extend the abstract and classes. 值得注意的异常包括 、和 控件。Notable exceptions include , , and the controls. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100))。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类是抽象类，因此不能直接创建 对象。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 此构造函数通常由派生类的构造函数调用，用于初始化 类中定义的属性。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ConfirmInitState() cil managed

summary.span: 设置数据绑定控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置数据绑定控件的初始化状态。The method sets the initialized state of the data-bound control. 方法由 类在其 方法中调用。The method is called by the class in its method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到调用的服务器控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写 方法，以确定数据绑定控件绑定到的数据源并生成适当的控件树。The class overrides the method to identify the data source that the data-bound control binds to and builds the appropriate control trees. 解析数据源时，将优先使用由 属性标识的数据源。When resolving the data source, the data source identified by the property takes precedence. 如果未设置 ，则使用 属性标识的对象。If is not set, the object identified by the property is used. 所有从 派生的 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件都将密封 `DataBind` 方法。The `DataBind` method is sealed on all ASP.NET data-bound controls derived from . 派生自 和 类的数据绑定控件应重写 `PerformDataBinding` 方法，而不是 方法来绑定数据。Data-bound controls derived from the and classes should override the `PerformDataBinding` method instead of the method to bind data. 如果重写 ， 和 事件将按顺序引发。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataBound As EventHandler

summary.span: 在服务器控件绑定到数据源后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the server control binds to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件通知服务器控件，为其编写的任何数据绑定逻辑都已完成。This event notifies the server control that any data binding logic written for it has completed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置对象，数据绑定控件从该对象中检索其数据项列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 一个表示数据源的对象，数据绑定控件从该对象中检索其数据。

span.span: An object that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性时，将调用 方法。When you set the property, the method is called. 此外，如果数据绑定控件已经初始化，则调用 方法，将 属性设置为 `true`。In addition, if the data-bound control has already been initialized, the method is called to set the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用数据绑定控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 在此示例中， 控件绑定到 对象。In this example, the control is bound to a object. 设置 属性后，将显式调用 方法。After the property is set, the method is called explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/CS/gridviewdatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/VB/gridviewdatabindvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据项列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 表示数据源的控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据。

span.span: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在设置 属性后，数据绑定控件已经初始化（ 方法或处理 事件），则会调用 方法，这会将 属性设置为 `true`。If the data-bound control has already been initialized (the method is called or event is handled) when you set the property, the method is called, which sets the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用数据绑定控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 控件通过将其 属性设置为 "AuthorsSqlDataSource" （ 控件的 ID）来关联到 控件。The control is associated to the control by setting its property to "AuthorsSqlDataSource", the ID of the control. 设置 属性（而不是 属性）时，数据绑定控件将在运行时自动绑定到数据源控件。When the property is set (instead of the property), the data-bound control automatically binds to the data source control at run time. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/CS/displaycustomers.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/VB/displaycustomers.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 如果设置了 属性且数据绑定控件标记为需要绑定，则调用 方法。

span.span: Calls the method if the property is set and the data-bound control is marked to require binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 方法中调用 方法，以便在尚未绑定数据绑定控件的情况下调用 方法。The method is called during the method, to call the method if the data-bound control is not yet bound. 这与 的行为模式相同（ 派生的类）和 类。This is the same behavior pattern that the (from which classes such as are derived) and classes follow. 调用 `CreateChildControls` 和 `LoadPostData` 方法的过程中，也可能会调用 `EnsureDataBound` 方法。The `EnsureDataBound` method might also be called during calls to `CreateChildControls` and `LoadPostData` methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 方法均将 属性显式设置为 `true`。The and methods both explicitly set the property to `true`. 方法由 方法调用，而 在引发 事件时调用。The method is called by the method, while is called when the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个属于派生的数据绑定控件类的属性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 该示例演示在数据绑定控件初始化之后，如果用于标识数据源的属性发生了更改，数据绑定控件如何调用 方法。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件（例如 、、和 ）使用 属性来确定数据绑定控件是否绑定到 ASP.NET 2.0 数据源控件，如 或 。Controls such as , , , and use the property to determine whether the data-bound control is bound to an ASP.NET 2.0 data source control, such as an or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生的数据绑定控件类使用 属性的方式。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 属性在 方法实现中使用，以确定是否应引发 事件。The property is used in the method implementation to determine whether the event should be raised. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件使用 属性，或如果控件使用 `SelectMethod`、`UpdateMethod`、`DeleteMethod`或 `InsertMethod` 属性进行数据绑定，数据绑定将自动进行。Data binding is automatic if the control uses the property or if the control uses `SelectMethod`, `UpdateMethod`, `DeleteMethod`, or `InsertMethod` properties for data binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataBound(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataBound (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnDataBound : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDataBound : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 一个包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知服务器控件任何与该控件关联的数据绑定逻辑都已完成。This method notifies a server control that any data binding logic associated with the control has completed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在派生自 的所有控件上， 方法是密封的。The method is sealed on all controls derived from . 数据绑定控件应重写 `PerformDataBinding`，而不是 方法来绑定数据。Data-bound controls should override `PerformDataBinding` instead of the method to bind data. 如果重写 ， 和 事件将按顺序引发。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法通过派生的数据绑定控件类引发 事件。The following code example demonstrates how the method is used to raise the event by a derived data-bound control class. 使用 和 方法将数据绑定到控件后，数据绑定控件将引发 事件，以指示数据绑定已完成。After using the and methods to bind data to the control, the data-bound control raises the event to signal that data binding is complete. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 在某一基数据源标识属性更改后，将数据绑定控件重新绑定到其数据。

span.span: Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 、或 `DataMember` 属性值在页的 事件发生之后的任意时间发生更改时，将调用 方法。The method is called when the , , or `DataMember` property value changes any time after the page's event has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个属于派生的数据绑定控件类的属性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 该示例演示在数据绑定控件初始化之后，如果用于标识数据源的属性发生了更改，数据绑定控件如何调用 方法。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#7)]

span.span: An attempt was made to change the property value during the data-binding phase of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法先调用基类 方法，然后调用 方法来处理 事件。The method first calls the base class method, and then calls the method to handle the event. 此外，如果对页的 HTTP 请求为回发并启用了视图状态，则 方法会将 属性设置为 `true`。Additionally, if the HTTP request to the page is a post back and view state is enabled, the method sets the property to `true`.

summary.span: 在加载数据绑定控件之前设置该控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件处理程序用于控制在页面的生命周期内何时发生数据绑定。The event handler is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page. 它通过设置数据绑定控件的内部初始化状态来实现此功能。It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control. 由于控件的已初始化状态是在页面生命周期的 阶段中设置的，因此只要在该阶段后更改控件的数据属性，就会调用 事件处理程序，以指示控件在呈现之前必须重新绑定到其数据。Because the control's initialized state is set during the phase of the page's lifecycle, the event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，控制如何检索数据并将数据绑定到控件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, controls how data is retrieved and bound to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类型重写此方法以从数据源中检索数据。Derived types override this method to retrieve data from a data source.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应调用 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method should be called.

value.span: 如果在呈现控件之前应调用数据绑定控件的 方法，则返回的值为 。否则，将 值。

span.span: The returned value is if the data-bound control's method should be called before the control is rendered; otherwise, the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `true` 当数据绑定控件已经开始向页面呈现其输出时，当前 HTTP 请求不是回调，并且你正在使用 属性来标识要绑定到的数据源控件， 方法会立即调用。If you set the property to `true` when the data-bound control has already begun to render its output to the page, the current HTTP request is not a callback, and you are using the property to identify the data source control to bind to, the method is called immediately. 在这种情况下， 属性实际不会设置为 `true`。In this case, the property is not actually set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生的数据绑定控件类使用 属性的方式。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 在 方法检索数据并将其绑定到具有 方法的控件之后， 属性设置为 `false`，并调用 方法以指示控件已完成绑定，而在当前页的生命周期内不再需要此属性。After data is retrieved by the method and bound to the control with the method, the property is set to `false` and the method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires this property during the current page's lifecycle. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0，则为 ;否则，。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果 `true`此属性，则在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现 `disabled` 属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果 `false`此属性，则在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现 `class` 属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

Protected MustOverride Sub ValidateDataSource (dataSource As Object)

param.name: dataSource

span.span: The object to verify.

param.span: 通常是 、、 或 的实例。

span.span: Typically an instance of , , , or .

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，验证数据绑定控件绑定到的对象是它可以使用的对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

para.span: 仅在 类的对 属性的赋值函数（setter）中调用 方法。

span.span: The method is only called in the class's mutator (setter) for the property.

para.span: 派生类实现方法以检查为 属性设置的对象的类型，以确保数据绑定控件可以使用该类型。

span.span: Derived classes implement the method to check the type of the object that is set for the property, to ensure that the data-bound control can work with the type.

para.span: 如果该类型无法识别，则派生类型实现将引发异常。

span.span: If the type is not recognized, derived type implementations throw an exception.
